duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute on vision and strategy for Strivr’s immersive products and broader strategic initiatives.
Build products for a diverse set of personas including enterprise customers, people training in VR, and content creators.
Work with cross-functional product, engineering, design, business, and customer stakeholders to develop and drive a long-term roadmap.
Lead and develop a senior team of Product Managers.
Set processes and standards that enable the team and organization to consistently deliver strong outcomes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a related field (Master's preferred)
